intro: Psychotria huantensis, commonly known as Huanténsis Psychotria, is a flowering plant species native to the tropical regions of South America. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its dark green, glossy leaves and clusters of small, white or pale green flowers. It typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as rainforests. Psychotria huantensis is also noted for its medicinal properties and has been used in traditional herbal remedies.
